name: Betting App
description: Web Application for soccer tournaments in Argentina, Brazil and USA. Where the user can vote for current matches, get points and win awards depending on theircountry

name: Butterflix (TMDB)
description: Movie and Tv show catalogue web application consuming TMDB's API. Available features include cookie based authentication,search, filters, favorites and exploring other user profiles.

name: Olympic Sports (e-commerce)
description: Web Application with different interaction possibilities according to users auth. Available features include cookie-based authentication, Google login, search, filters, favorites, cart, size selection, purchase history, mail order confirmation, admin panel to control users, products and categories.

name: Greenland SW
description: A themeable and developer-centric portfolio based on the VSCode

name: GT Color
description: Web game, where you have to guess the correct RGB color

name: Typer 3000
description: Web game, where you must quickly write the words that appear before the counter reaches 0

name: To Do List
description: Web application where you can write a list of things you have to do. Where you can edit or delete them as you need

name: Weather Channel
description: Web application where from an external api, you can search for information about the weather of the location you want.

name: Saturday Countdown
description: Web application where you can see an online clock with Argentina time, where there is also a counter until Saturday
